projects.title: To-Do List
projects.bodyText:
- To-Do List App developed using Python and tkinter
 - A basic app that allows users to add tasks and delete them once completed.

projects.title: Contact Book Application
projects.bodyText:
- Contact Book Application developed using Python and tkinter.
 - This application enables users to manage contacts efficiently with features for adding, viewing, searching, updating, and deleting contacts.

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.bodyText:
- Password Generator developed using Python and tkinter.
 - Generates passwords based on user-defined length, incorporating a mix of alphabets, numbers, and symbols.

projects.title: Hangman Game
projects.bodyText:
- Developed using Python, this interactive game challenges players to guess a randomly selected word from a list that includes 'apple', 'banana', 'orange', and more.
 - Players have a limited number of attempts to guess letters correctly. Incorrect guesses lead to the gradual drawing of a 'hangman' figure.
 - Guess all letters correctly before running out of attempts to win!.

projects.title: Password Manager
projects.bodyText:
- Developed using Python, this secure application allows users to store and manage passwords for various services.
 - Utilizes AES encryption to safeguard passwords, ensuring sensitive data remains protected from unauthorized access.
 - Features an intuitive command-line interface enabling users to add, retrieve, and delete passwords with ease, enhancing user convenience and data security.

projects.title: To-Do List Web Application
projects.bodyText:
- Built using Python and Flask, this web app enables efficient task management with features for adding, prioritizing, and deleting tasks.
 - Prioritize and manage tasks easily with user-defined priority levels. Add, adjust, and delete tasks via a straightforward form interface.
 - Built-in functionality ensures seamless task management. Users can easily add, delete, and prioritize tasks, enhancing productivity and organization in their daily routines.

projects.title: Cricket Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.bodyText:
-Developed an interactive data visualization dashboard using Dash and Plotly for ICC World Cup 2007 Indian team performance.
 - Utilized Python and Pandas for data analysis, data visualization dashboard using Dash and Plotly, ensuring accurate and insightful visual representations.
 - Designed a responsive web application, enhancing user experience with dynamic visualizations.
